example: We should respect each other's culture.
logic: CULT (耕种) - 心灵与社会的持续耕耘

example: Civil rights are protected by law.
logic: CIV (城市) - 属于城市居民/公民的

example: Education helped to civilize the wild tribes.
logic: 使人具备文明社会的行为规范

example: A civilized society values human rights.
logic: 已经脱离野蛮状态的

example: Ancient civilization began along rivers.
logic: 人类社会进步的高级阶段

example: He struggled with his personal identity.
logic: IDEM (相同) - 定义“我是谁”的一致性

example: Language plays a key role in national identity.
logic: 对所属国家的文化/心理归属感

example: Cultural identity connects people to their heritage.
logic: 对特定文化群体的认同感

example: The Renaissance was a remarkable period.
logic: PERI (周围/环绕) + OD (路) - 时间的一段周期

example: We live in the digital era.
logic: 以特定特征划分的宏大历史阶段

example: Dinosaurs lived in the prehistoric era.
logic: PRE (前) + HISTORY - 文字记录之前的时代

example: Ancient civilizations like Egypt were very advanced.
logic: 数千年前形成的早期人类文明

example: Castles were common in medieval Europe.
logic: MEDI (中) + EV (时代) - 介于古典与现代之间

example: The Renaissance was a time of great creativity.
logic: RE (再) + NAISS (出生) - 文明的重生

example: The Enlightenment promoted science and reason.
logic: EN (进入) + LIGHT (光) - 用理性之光驱散愚昧

example: The Industrial Revolution changed society forever.
logic: 转动 (VOLV) 带来的生产力彻底变革

example: The origin of the tradition is unknown.
logic: 太阳升起的地方，引申为开端

example: Jazz originated in the United States.
logic: 产生，创发于某处

example: Only the strongest animals survived the flood.
logic: SUR (在上面) + VIV (生命) - 在灾难之上活下来

example: Humans evolved from primates.
logic: E (出) + VOLV (卷/转) - 像卷轴一样展开演变

example: Evolution explains the diversity of life.
logic: 生物学或社会的演进过程

example: My ancestors came from northern China.
logic: ANTE (前) + CEST (走) - 走在前面的人

example: Birds migrate south for the winter.
logic: 改变居住地的移动行为

example: Migrants often face many challenges.
logic: 正在移动或迁移的人/动物

example: Migration is common among early humans.
logic: 大规模的人口或动物移动

example: Many people emigrated to America in the 1800s.
logic: E (出) + MIGR - 离开自己的国家

example: Emigrants left their country for a better life.
logic: 从本国移出的人

example: The war led to mass emigration.
logic: 移居国外的行为

example: He immigrated to Canada last year.
logic: IM (进入) + MIGR - 进入新的国家

example: Immigrants contribute to cultural diversity.
logic: 从外国移入定居的人

example: Immigration policies vary from country to country.
logic: 外来定居的管理或过程

example: People of all races deserve equal rights.
logic: 基于生理特征的人类分类

example: Climate change is a threat to the human race.
logic: 整个人类群体（人属）

example: The majority voted in favor of the law.
logic: MAJOR (更大) - 超过半数的群体

example: Ethnic minorities are protected.
logic: MINOR (更小) - 占比极小的群体

example: The country is home to many ethnic groups.
logic: 源自希腊语 ETHNOS (人民/国家)

example: Shaking hands is a common custom.
logic: 长久形成的社会行为习惯

example: You can customize your profile picture.
logic: 按个人习惯/需求进行调整

example: The suit was tailored for him.
logic: 原指剪裁衣服，引申为个性化适配

example: We watched the trailer before the movie.
logic: 在后面拖着的物体/最后剪辑出的短片

example: This flower is made of artificial silk.
logic: ARTI (技巧) + FAC (做) - 用技巧制造而非天然

example: The museum displayed ancient artefacts.
logic: 古代人手工制造的具有文化价值的物体

example: The vase is very delicate.
logic: 精美而脆弱的状态

example: She wore a subtle scent of jasmine.
logic: SUB (在下) + TEX (织) - 隐约、不明显的

example: I love reading old folktales.
logic: FOLK (平民) + TALE (故事) - 口耳相传的传说

example: The sculpture is made of bronze.
logic: SCULP (雕刻) - 硬质材料的三维艺术

example: A marble bust of Beethoven.
logic: 仅包含头、颈、肩部分的雕像

example: They held a feast to celebrate the harvest.
logic: 丰盛的饮食与庆祝活动

example: The wedding ceremony was very touching.
logic: 正式且庄重的程序性活动

example: We sat around the campfire.
logic: 营地中心用于取暖和社交的火

example: People come here to worship.
logic: WORTH (价值) + SHIP - 赋予极高的价值与敬意

example: The dove is a symbol of peace.
logic: SYM (共同) + BOL (投掷) - 放在一起代表特定含义

example: Red often symbolizes passion.
logic: 作为某种意义的符号

example: We should protect our cultural heritage.
logic: 继承人 (HEIR) 所承接的文化或自然资产
